meanings: (서로 손을 잡다) hold hands, join hands
(힘을 합치다) cooperate (with), combine (with), join hands (with), join together, join[combine] forces (with)
(손으로 쥐다) hold (sth in one's hand), take, (꽉) grasp, grip, (literary) clasp, (갑작스레) grab, seize
